relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
anyone that enjoys the outdoors and is looking for a career in natural resources.
smart start is an additional week at the beginning of the year for new students. it gives new students a chance to meet new people and get to know the area a little better.

nelsonville is a small town with not much to do if you don't know how to entertain yourself. there are many trails up behind the school that you can hike on. movies 10, which is just a 10 minute drive down 33 has an arcade and a movie theatre. 20-30 minutes away, in logan is old man's cave where you can hike and enjoy the scenery. ou, about a 15-20 minute drive away has many small time shops that are very interesting to go into.
make sure that when you're enrolling, you're paying close attention to any e-mails and papers you are sent. hold onto everything and keep organized.

hocking college is a great school for anyone attempting to pursue a career in natural resources. you will have a variety of classes that all pertain to your major. it is a two year college, but you can choose to go for multiple majors which will keep you at the college longer.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety Campus safety is awesome! There is always campus security walking around especially at night, to make sure that everything is okay and safe. and if you don't feel safe walking from point A to point B you can call the campus police and they will drive you where need to be. Or even if you need a ride to work. What to do for fun For fun you can take walks around the campus or even the town, ride horses, go to Athens and explore the city. OR go rock climbing, swimming, lift weights, play basketball or table tennis in the student center. Food and Dining The food isn't that of a 5 star restaurant, but it gets the job done. Each day they have a special. The personal favorite is the chinese food day. There is a salad bar and they do have made to order food, like, hamburgers, fries, chicken sandwiches, chicken strips, Fish sandwiches, boneless wings, etc. There is also a convient store where you can do a little grocery shopping Dorm Life Dorm life... Is dorm life. Here everyone is
